xpack.runtimeFields.editor.validationErr: Fix errors in form before continuing.
xpack.runtimeFields.form.fieldShadowingC: This field shares the name of a mapped field. Values for this field will be returned in search results.
xpack.runtimeFields.form.source.scriptFi: Runtime fields without a script retrieve values from a field with the same name in {source}. If a field with the same name doesn’t exist, no values return when a search request includes the runtime field. {learnMoreLink}
xpack.runtimeFields.form.validations.nam: Give a name to the field.
There is already a field with this name.
